sentences.en: He was visited by an old friend from Iraq.
sentences.cn: 一位来自伊拉克的老朋友来看望他。

sentences.en: I have a picture of you and I together in Iraq.
sentences.cn: 我有一张您和我一起在伊拉克的照片。

sentences.en: I have no idea how he got into Iraq.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他是怎样进入伊拉克的。

sentences.en: I learned about the present acute situation in Iraq in the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 我从报上得知伊拉克目前的严重局势。

sentences.en: I needed my medication before shipping out to Iraq.
sentences.cn: 外出去伊拉克之前,我需要药品.

sentences.en: I wasn't making analogy between the Iraq war and ChangE 1.
sentences.cn: 我并不是在伊拉克战争和长征一号两者间做类比.

sentences.en: In the weeks ahead, violence in Iraq may escalate.
sentences.cn: 在之后的这几周, 伊拉克的暴力行为可能会升级.

sentences.en: Iraq has been drained of its strength by the Gulf War.
sentences.cn: 海湾战争使伊拉克大伤元气.

sentences.en: Jordan reopened its border with Iraq.
sentences.cn: 约旦重新开放了与伊拉克的边界。

sentences.en: More immediately, Iraq and the Iraqi military establishment will escape destruction.
sentences.cn: 目前更为紧迫的是, 伊拉克和伊拉克的军队要免遭毁灭.

sentences.en: So why go to Iraq when you can go to Canada?
sentences.cn: 因此，如果你可以去加拿大的话，为什么要去伊拉克呢？

sentences.en: That was regarded as an Iranian defeat of Iraq.
sentences.cn: 人们认为那是伊朗挫败了伊拉克.

sentences.en: The situation in Iraq has turned sour.
sentences.cn: 伊拉克的局势已趋恶化.

sentences.en: Their cloak of neutrality in the Iran - Iraq war was beginning to wear a bit thin.
sentences.cn: 他们在两伊战争中表面上所采取的中立态度开始有点露馅了.

sentences.en: They delivered an ultimatum to Iraq.
sentences.cn: 他们向伊拉克发出最后通牒.

sentences.en: Traffic from Jordan to Iraq is down to a dozen loaded lorries a day, compared with a high of 200 a day.
sentences.cn: 现在从约旦到伊拉克一天只有十几辆装货的卡车通过，而最高峰时可达到一天200辆。

sentences.en: We will help Iraq train its security forces and develop its economy.
sentences.cn: 我们将帮助伊拉克训练安全部队和发展经济.

sentences.en: You believe that story about a cover - up in Iraq, Gibbs?
sentences.cn: 你相信有关在伊拉克掩护的事情吗, 吉布斯?
